name: EltexSoft
tagline: Web Applications | Mobile Apps | UX & Branding
description:
EltexSoft is focused on product delivery of web and mobile apps. We boast ultimate quality, meeting deadlines and budgets, working closely on product and UX with our clients. Excellence in engineering, design, product management and quality assurance is our standard approach across all the projects.
 
Our areas of expertise include:
• UX design
• Responsive, single page web apps
• Native mobile apps (iOS, Android)
• Multi and cross platform solutions
 
We’ve built multiple successful startups in:
• HR & Recruiting (matching, CRMs)
• Medical, Health & Wellness (full scale platforms)
• Food (production, delivery, sales)
• Transportation (commute, shared economy)
• Education (matching, CRMs, data management, online learning)
• 3D Printing (management platforms)
